prosCardsPage.title: Simple and reliable for the buyer

card1.title: Credit for all cars
card1.text: Credit for both new and used cars. Passenger cars, trucks, watercraft and motorcycles.

card1.title: What documents are needed to apply for a loan?
card1.text: Cash loan from VTB is a favorable interest rate, comfortable repayment terms and the ability to spend funds for any purpose. You can get a cash loan without collateral, certificates and on excellent terms.

card2.title: Can I choose a car after the loan is approved?
card2.text: Cash loan from VTB is a favorable interest rate, comfortable repayment terms and the ability to spend funds for any purpose. You can get a cash loan without collateral, certificates and on excellent terms.

card3.title: Is it possible to get a car loan in cash?
card3.text: Cash loan from VTB is a favorable interest rate, comfortable repayment terms and the ability to spend funds for any purpose. You can get a cash loan without collateral, certificates and on excellent terms.

card4.title: Is it possible to include payment for insurance, equipment and other services in the car loan amount?
card4.text: Cash loan from VTB is a favorable interest rate, comfortable repayment terms and the ability to spend funds for any purpose. You can get a cash loan without collateral, certificates and on excellent terms.

card5.title: Is it possible to pay off a car loan early?
card5.text: Cash loan from VTB is a favorable interest rate, comfortable repayment terms and the ability to spend funds for any purpose. You can get a cash loan without collateral, certificates and on excellent terms.

card6.title: What kind of car can you get on credit?
